title: openai.embeddings.request
description: Request schema for OpenAI Embeddings API

model.description: ID of the model to use (only current 2025 models from MODEL_MANIFEST.md)

input.description: Input text to get embeddings for (string or array of strings)

user.description: Unique identifier for end-user (for abuse monitoring)

encoding_format.description: Format to return the embeddings in

dimensions.description: Number of dimensions for the output embeddings (only for text-embedding-3 models)
